MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 postcode area of Oswestry, affecting properties in the and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9:46 AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs needed to a broken piece of equipment on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:56 AM on 19th February 2021..
